00113           public function doadmin($username,$password,$action,$soap,$options=false){
00114                     $this->buildadminclient();
00115                     
00116                     if(count($options)>0){
00117                               $this->options=$options;
00118                     }else{
00119                               $this->options=$this->defaultopions;
00120                     }
00121                     
00122                     $this->admin_username=$username;
00123                     $this->admin_password=$password;
00124                     
00125                     $a=$this->dosoap_admin($action,$soap);
00126                     
00127                     // Error loggen...
00128                     if(isset($ret['soap:Body']['soap:Fault']['soap:faultstring'])){
00129                         zlog::soapErrlog($ret);
00130                     }
00131 
00132                     return $a;
00133           }

00146           public function douser($username,$action,$urn,$soap,$options=array()){

00148                     $this->user_username=$username;
00149                     $this->builduserclient();

00151                     if(count($options)>0){
00152                               $this->options=$options;
00153                     }else{
00154                               $this->options=$this->defaultopions;
00155                     }
00156

00158 
00159                     // Error loggen...
00160                     if(isset($ret['soap:Body']['soap:Fault']['soap:faultstring'])){
00161                         zlog::soaperrlog($ret);
00162                     }
00163 
00164                     return $a;
00165

00174           public function __construct(){
00175                     if(file_exists($this->path.$this->_cachefile)){
00176                     
00177                               $vars=file_get_contents($this->path.$this->_cachefile);
00178                               $vars=unserialize($vars);
00179                               
00180                               if(is_array($vars)){
00181                                         $this->cacheconfig=$vars;
00182                               }
00183                     }
00184                     $this->_timestamp=time().'000';
00185                     $this->path=dirname(__FILE__).'/../';
00186           }

00197           private function dosoap_admin($action,$soap,$forcenewlogin=false){
00198                     
00199                     $this->admin_login($forcenewlogin);
00200                     
00201                     $soap_header='
00202 <context xmlns="urn:zimbra">
00203 <authToken>'.$this->admin_authtoken.'</authToken>
00204 <sessionId id="'.$this->admin_sessid.'">'.$this->admin_sessid.'</sessionId> 
00205 </context>';
00206                     $header=new SoapHeader(
00207                               'urn:zimbra',
00208                               'context',
00209                               new SoapVar($soap_header,XSD_ANYXML)
00210                     );
00211                     
00212                     $params=array(
00213                               new SoapVar($soap,XSD_ANYXML)
00214                     );
00215                     
00216                     $options=array('uri'=>'urn:zimbraAdmin');
00217 
00218                     $response=$this->dosoap($action,$header,$params,$options);
00219                     $response_a=$this->xml2array($response);
00220                                                             
00221                     $err=c($response_a['soap:Body']['soap:Fault']['soap:detail']['Error']['Code']);
00222 
00223                     // Bei Fehlern...
00224                     if($err){
00225                               // Wenn AUTH fehlgeschlagen, aufhören...
00226                               if($err=='account.AUTH_FAILED'){
00227                                         zlog::hardError('ADMIN AUTH FAILED!',array($action,$header,$params,$options));
00228                                         exit;
00229                                         
00230                               // Wenn Fehler und newlogin nicht getan, sondern auf vergangene Session vertraut => nochmal probieren
00231                               // mit erzwungenem einloggen
00232                               }else if($err=='service.AUTH_REQUIRED'){
00233                                         if(!$forcenewlogin){
00234                                                   return $this->dosoap_admin($action,$soap,true);                                 
00235                                         }else{
00236                                                   zlog::hardError('ADMIN AUTH FAILED! (endless)',array($action,$header,$params,$options));
00237                                                   exit;
00238                                         }
00239                               }
00240                     }
00241                     
00242                     return $response_a;
00243           }

00255           private function dosoap_user($action,$urn,$soap,$forcenewlogin=false){
00256                     
00257                     $this->user_login($forcenewlogin);
00258                     
00259                     $soap_header='
00260 <context xmlns="urn:zimbra">
00261 <authToken>'.$this->user_authtoken. '</authToken>
00262 <sessionId id="'.$this->user_sessid.'">'.$this->user_sessid.'</sessionId> 
00263 </context>';
00264 
00265                     $header=new SoapHeader(
00266                               'urn:zimbra',
00267                               'context',
00268                               new SoapVar($soap_header,XSD_ANYXML)
00269                     );
00270                               
00271                     $params=array(
00272                               new SoapVar($soap,XSD_ANYXML)
00273                     );
00274                     
00275                     $options=array('uri'=>'urn:'.$urn);
00276                     
00277                     $response=$this->dosoap($action,$header,$params,$options);
00278                     $response_a=$this->xml2array($response);
00279                     
00280 
00281                     $err=c($response_a['soap:Body']['soap:Fault']['soap:detail']['Error']['Code']);
00282 
00283                     // Bei Fehlern...
00284                     if($err){
00285                               // Wenn AUTH fehlgeschlagen, aufhören...
00286                               if($err=='account.AUTH_FAILED'){
00287                                         zlog::soapErrLog('AUTH FAILED: ');
00288                                         return false;
00289 
00290                               // Wenn Fehler und newlogin nicht getan, sondern auf vergangene Session vertraut => nochmal probieren
00291                               // mit erzwungenem einloggen
00292                               }else if($err=='service.AUTH_REQUIRED'){
00293                                         if(!$forcenewlogin){
00294                                                   return $this->dosoap_user($urn,$action,$soap,true);
00295                                         }else{
00296                                                   zlog::soapErrLog('AUTH FAILED (endless)');
00297                                                   return false;
00298                                         }
00299                               }
00300                     }
00301           
00302                     return $response_a;
00303           }         
00304           
00312           private function admin_login($forcenew=false){
00313                     // if not forcenewlogin and a  AUTH and SESSID exists and they are not expired... 
00314                     // => take them and return...
00315                     if(!$forcenew && isset($this->cacheconfig['admin'][$this->admin_username])){
00316                               
00317                               $data=$this->cacheconfig['admin'][$this->admin_username];
00318                               if(     isset($data['sessid']) && isset($data['authtoken']) && isset($data['endtime']) 
00319                                   && mktime()<$data['endtime']
00320                               ){
00321                                         $this->admin_sessid=$data['sessid'];
00322                                         $this->admin_authtoken=$data['authtoken'];
00323                                         return;
00324                               }
00325                     //otherwise login admin account
00326                     }
00327                     
00328                     $header=new SoapHeader('urn:zimbra','context');
00329                               
00330                     $params=array(
00331                               new SoapParam($this->admin_username,'name'),
00332                               new SoapParam($this->admin_password,'password')
00333                     );
00334 
00335                     $options=array('uri'=>'urn:zimbraAdmin');
00336                     
00337                     $result=$this->dosoap('AuthRequest',$header,$params,$options,true);
00338                     
00339                     // IF AUTH FAILED
00340                     if(!$result){
00341                               zlog::hardError('ADMIN AUTH FAILED!',array($header,$params,$options));
00342                               exit;
00343                     }
00344 
00345                     // Store result to cache
00346                     $this->admin_sessid=$result['sessionId'];
00347                     $this->admin_authtoken=$result['authToken'];
00348                     $this->admin_endtime=mktime()+$result['lifetime']/1000; //time comes in ms...
00349                     $this->setcachvalue();
00350           }
00351 
00360           private function user_login($forcenew=false){
00361                     
00362                     // if not forcenewlogin and a  AUTH and SESSID exists and they are not expired... 
00363                     // => take them and return...
00364                     if(!$forcenew && isset($this->cacheconfig['user'][$this->user_username])){
00365                     
00366                               $data=$this->cacheconfig['user'][$this->user_username];
00367                               
00368                               if(    isset($data['sessid']) && isset($data['authtoken']) && isset($data['endtime']) 
00369                                   && mktime()<$data['endtime']
00370                                 ){
00371                                         $this->user_sessid=$data['sessid'];
00372                                         $this->user_authtoken=$data['authtoken'];
00373                                         return;
00374                               }
00375                     // otherwise login User
00376                     }
00377                     
00378                     // PreAuth
00379                     $by_value='name';
00380           
00381                     $preauth_uncrypt=$this->user_username.'|'.$by_value.'|'.$this->_preauth_expiration.'|'.$this->_timestamp; 
00382                     $preauth_crypt=hash_hmac('sha1',$preauth_uncrypt,$this->_preAuthKey);
00383                                         
00384                     $soap='
00385 <account by="name">'.$this->user_username.'</account> 
00386 <preauth timestamp="'.$this->_timestamp.'" expires="'.$this->_preauth_expiration.'">'.$preauth_crypt.'</preauth>
00387 ';
00388                     
00389                     $header=new SoapHeader('urn:zimbra','context');
00390                     $params=array(new SoapVar($soap,XSD_ANYXML));
00391                     
00392                     $options=array('uri'=>'urn:zimbraAccount');
00393                     
00394                     $result=$this->dosoap('AuthRequest',$header,$params,$options,true);
00395 
00396                     // IF AUTH FAILED
00397                     if(!$result){
00398                               zlog::soapErrLog('AUTH FAILED: ');
00399                               return false;
00400                     }
00401                     
00402                     // Store result to cache
00403                     $this->user_sessid=$result['sessionId'];
00404                     $this->user_authtoken=$result['authToken'];
00405                     $this->user_endtime=mktime()+$result['lifetime']/1000; // Kommt in ms an interessanter weise...?
00406                               
00407                     $this->setcachvalue();
00408           }

00423           private function dosoap($action,$header,$params,$options,$loginaction=false){
00424                               
00425                     try{
00426                               $result = $this->client->__soapCall(
00427                                         $action, 
00428                                         $params, 
00429                                         $options,
00430                                         $header
00431                               );
00432 
00433                     }catch (SoapFault $exception) {
00434                     }
00435 
00436                     // DEbug information...
00437                     if(zimbraConfig::debug){
00438                               $t=array(array('<','>'),array('&lt;','&gt;'));
00439                               ob_start();
00440                               echo "<pre>\n\n=============== SOAP ANFANG =======================\n";
00441                               
00442                               echo "\n\nREQUEST:m\n";
00443                               print_r(str_replace($t[0],$t[1],$this->client->__getLastRequest()));
00444                               print_r( $this->xml2array($this->client->__getLastRequest()));
00445                               
00446                               echo "\n\nRESPONSEm:\n";
00447                               print_r(str_replace($t[0],$t[1],$this->client->__getLastResponse()));
00448                               print_r( $this->xml2array($this->client->__getLastResponse()));
00449                               echo "\n====================SOAP ENDE ==================\n\n<pre>";
00450                               $f=ob_get_clean();
00451                               zlog::debugLog('SOAP DEBUG',$f);
00452 
00453                     }
00454                     
00455                     // Bei Login kommt hier der authtoken, sessid usw. zurück.
00456                     if($loginaction){
00457                               if(isset($result)){
00458                                         return $result;
00459                               }else{
00460                                         return false;
00461                               }
00462                     }else{
00463                               return $this->client->__getLastResponse();
00464                     }
00465           }

00500           
00507           private function builduserclient(){
00508                     if($this->client_user==null){
00509                               $this->client_user=new SoapClient(null,
00510                                         array(
00511                                                   'location' => $this->_userlocation,
00512                                                   'uri' => "urn:zimbra",
00513                                                   'trace' => 1,
00514                                                   'exceptions' => 1,
00515                                                   'soap_version' => SOAP_1_1,
00516                                                   'style' => SOAP_RPC,
00517                                                   'use' => SOAP_LITERAL
00518                                         )
00519                               );
00520                     }
00521                     $this->client=&$this->client_user;
00522           }
00523           
00530           private function buildadminclient(){
00531                     if($this->client_admin==null){
00532                               $this->client_admin = new SoapClient(null,
00533                                         array(
00534                                                   'location' => $this->_adminlocation,
00535                                                   'uri' => "urn:zimbraAdmin",
00536                                                   'trace' => 1,
00537                                                   'exceptions' => 1,
00538                                                   'soap_version' => SOAP_1_1,
00539                                                   'style' => SOAP_RPC,
00540                                                   'use' => SOAP_LITERAL
00541                                         )
00542                               );
00543                     }
00544                     $this->client=&$this->client_admin;
00545           }

00547           // donnotaskey: Ausschalten: bei <a n="zimbramailirgendwas">Value</a> => array[zimbramailirgendwas]=Value
00555           function xml2array($contents){
00556                     
00557                     if(isset($this->options['parse']) && $this->options['parse']===false){
00558                               return $contents;
00559                     }
00560                     $errrep=error_reporting(0);
00561                     // XML Parser herrichten...
00562                     ini_set('include_path', $this->path.'PEAR');
00563                     set_include_path($this->path.'PEAR');
00564                     
00565                     require_once 'XML/Unserializer.php';
00566                     $options=array(
00567                               XML_UNSERIALIZER_OPTION_ATTRIBUTES_PARSE    => true,
00568                               //XML_UNSERIALIZER_OPTION_ATTRIBUTES_ARRAYKEY => false
00569                     );
00570                     
00571                     //user options...
00572                     if(!isset($this->options['donnotaskey']) || $this->options['donnotaskey']!=1){
00573                               $options['keyAttribute']='n'; 
00574                     }
00575           
00576                     //  be careful to always use the ampersand in front of the new operator                                       
00577                     $unserializer = new XML_Unserializer(
00578                               $options
00579                     );
00580                     
00581                     $d=false;
00582                     
00583                     $status = $unserializer->unserialize($contents, false);   
00584 
00585                     if(PEAR::isError($status)){
00586                               echo 'Error: ' . $status->getMessage();
00587                     }else{
00588                               $d = $unserializer->getUnserializedData();
00589                     }
00590                     error_reporting($errrep);
00591                     
00592                     return $d;
00593           }
00594           
00602           private function setcachvalue(){
00603                     
00604                     if($this->admin_username!=''){
00605                               $a=&$this->cacheconfig['admin'][$this->admin_username];
00606                               $a=array(
00607                                         'authtoken'=>$this->admin_authtoken,
00608                                         'sessid'=>$this->admin_sessid,
00609                                         'endtime'=>$this->admin_endtime
00610                               );
00611                               //echo "dateY: ".date('d.m.Y H:i',$a['endtime']);
00612                     }
00613                     
00614                     if($this->user_username!=''){
00615                               $a=&$this->cacheconfig['user'][$this->user_username];
00616                               $a=array(
00617                                         'authtoken'=>$this->user_authtoken,
00618                                         'sessid'=>$this->user_sessid,
00619                                         'endtime'=>$this->user_endtime
00620                               );
00621                     }
00622                     
00623                     $vars=serialize($this->cacheconfig);
00624                     
00625                     file_put_contents($this->path.$this->_cachefile,$vars);
00626           }

00651           public function doUpload($username, $files){
00652                     // Authentifizieren...
00653                     // einmal nur als user...
00654                     // Wegen autthoken...
00655                     
00656                     //echo "Test".$this->user_authtoken."test";
00657                     $retval=false;
00658                     
00659                     // Files uploaden...
00660                     if(!is_array($files)){
00661                               $files=array($files);
00662                     }
00663                     
00664                     // Post array vorbereiten...
00665                     $post=array();
00666                     
00667                     $i=0;     
00668                     foreach($files as $filetoupload){
00669                               $filepath=$this->getUploadFile($filetoupload);
00670                               if($filepath!==false){
00671                                         $post['file'.$i]='@'.$filepath;
00672                                         $i++;
00673                               }
00674                     }
00675                     
00676                     // Wenn noch nicht eingellogged => einloggen
00677                     if(strlen($this->user_authtoken)<3){
00678                               $this->user_username=$username;
00679                               $this->builduserclient();
00680                               $this->user_login(true); // with forcenew...
00681                     }
00682                     
00683                     $post['requestId']='client_token'; // Hier kann man irgendwas einfügen...
00684 
00685                     // Wenn Files zum uploaden da...
00686                     if($i>0){
00687                               
00688                               $this->builduserclient();
00689                               $this->user_username=$username;
00690                               $this->user_login();
00691                               
00692                               $ch = curl_init();
00693                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0);
00694                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 0);
00695                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
00696                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, 'Mozilla/4.0 (compatible;)');
00697                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $this->_uploadlocation.'?fmt=raw' );
00698                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
00699                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_COOKIE,'ZM_AUTH_TOKEN='.$this->user_authtoken);
00700                               
00701                               // Vorfühlen
00702                               $response = curl_exec($ch);
00703                               if(strpos($response,'HTTP ERROR: 401')!==false){
00704                                         echo "AUTH FAILED1";
00705                                         // Neu Login erzwingen...
00706                                         $this->user_login(true);
00707                                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_COOKIE,'ZM_AUTH_TOKEN='.$this->user_authtoken);
00708                                         $response = curl_exec($ch);
00709                               }
00710                               
00711                               // Wenn leerer Upload geklappt hat
00712                               if(strpos($response,"204,'null'")!==false){
00713                                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $post); 
00714                                         $response = curl_exec($ch);
00715                                         
00716                                         $response=preg_match('/200,\'client_token\',\'(.*)\'/msU',$response,$out);
00717                                         $retval=explode(',',$out[1]);
00718                               
00719                               // Wenn nicht...
00720                               }else{
00721                                         echo "Fehler: AUTH";
00722                                         p($response);
00723                               }
00724                               
00725                               //p($out);
00726                               $this->cleantmp_filedir();
00727 
00728                     }else{
00729                               echo "No files to Upload";
00730                     }
00731                     
00732                     return $retval;
00733           }

00736           // [i][0]=ordner
00737           // [i][1]=file (Ohne path!)
00741           var $tmp_filedir=array();
00742 
00750           private function getUploadFile($filetoupload){
00751                     
00752                     $urlext=array('http');
00753                     
00754                     $pathtofile=$filetoupload;
00755                     
00756                     foreach($urlext as $prot){
00757                               
00758                               // if it's an Webfile...
00759                               if(strpos($filetoupload,$prot.'://')!==false){
00760                                         
00761                                         // Ordner, damit der Filename erhalten bleibt!
00762                                         $pathtofile_dir=$this->path.'/'.$this->_tmpdir.'/'.mktime().'_'.rand();
00763                                         
00764                                         mkdir($pathtofile_dir,0777);
00765                                         
00766                                         // Filenamen holen..
00767                                         $fileinfo=pathinfo($filetoupload);
00768           
00769                                         $pathtofile=$pathtofile_dir.'/'.$fileinfo['basename'];
00770                                         
00771                                         // save file temporaly on server, for uploading
00772                                         // Check, if it exists..
00773                                         $fp=@fopen($filetoupload,'r');
00774                                         if($fp!==false){
00775                                                   // filegetcontent is binary safe.
00776                                                   $bits=file_get_contents($filetoupload);
00777                                                   file_put_contents($pathtofile,$bits);
00778                                                   
00779                                                   // mark it for delete
00780                                                   $this->tmp_filedir[]=array($pathtofile_dir,$fileinfo['basename']);
00781                                         
00782                                         }
00783                                         if($fp!==false)fclose($fp);
00784           
00785                                         break;
00786                               }
00787                     }
00788                     
00789                     // Wenn datei nicht lokal exisitiert...
00790                     if(!file_exists($pathtofile)){
00791                               echo "File not found: $filetoupload<br>\n";
00792                               return false;
00793                     }
00794                     
00795                     return $pathtofile;
00796           }
00797           
00804           private function cleantmp_filedir(){
00805                     if(isset($this->tmp_filedir)){
00806                               foreach($this->tmp_filedir as $d){
00807                                         unlink($d[0].'/'.$d[1]);
00808                                         rmdir($d[0]);
00809                               }
00810                     }
00811           }
00812           
00813 }
